llm_recommendations.reason_for_recommendation: Analyst recommendation to buy; strong bullish continuation setup on daily chart after prolonged consolidation; decisive breakout above previous resistance zone (₹650–655) with wide-range bullish candle and expanded volume; trading comfortably above key moving averages.

Analyst recommendation to buy; strong trend reversal and bullish continuation setup on daily chart after prolonged corrective decline; sharp recovery from lower levels, decisive move above key EMAs; supported by strong bullish candles and notable surge in volume.

Analyst recommendation to buy; bullish recovery and trend resumption setup on daily chart after healthy corrective phase; shift back toward bullish momentum supported by higher lows; reclaimed 20 EMA and 50 EMA, with steady volume expansion.
Analyst buy recommendation by Vaishali Parekh.
